summary: This document details the items seized from Jeffrey Epstein during his arrest on July 6, 2019. It includes descriptions of electronic devices collected from him, specifically an iPhone and an iPad, along with their serial numbers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of this document, from whom items were seized during his arrest.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested, and items were seized from him at that time.

keyFacts: Items seized included a black iPhone and a silver iPad.
The document was approved and drafted by FBI personnel.
The items were collected from Epstein's person.
The document is classified as unclassified and contains no recommendations or conclusions.
